comments.body: Bracket might be on standby until 1.0.0-MF, so might happen after 0.10. This remains to be decided, but FYI we might need to add a mention. Not now, something to keep in mind.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@# Bracket

A `Monad` that can acquire, use and release resources in a safe way.
